content: The Service provider XML URL address which can be downloaded and used by the Identity provider to unequivocally identify the SP

comment.text: The "SPEntityIdTooltip" translation key provides a tooltip to help users understand that the metadata URL address is used to uniquely identify a Service Provider in the Single Sign-On process. This tooltip appears on the MetadataUrlField component in the PortalSettings page and helps clarify its purpose.

usage.context:
<StyledWrapper>
 <MetadataUrlField
 labelText={t("SPEntityId")}
 name="spEntityId"
 placeholder={`${url}/sso/metadata`}
 tooltipContent={<Text fontSize="12px">{t("SPEntityIdTooltip")}</Text>}
 tooltipClass="sp-entity-id-tooltip icon-button"
 />
 
 <MetadataUrlField
 labelText={t("SPAssertionConsumerURL")}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "لغة التوصيف الموسعة" (Language of Extended Description) is not a standard or accurate translation for 'SPEntityIdTooltip' or its English meaning. It's overly technical and unclear.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more understandable translation like: "عنوان URL الخاص بموفر الخدمة" (Service provider URL) or "رابط XML الخاص بموفر الخدمة" (Service provider XML link).  The choice depends on the context and audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure feels somewhat clunky. "عنوان رابط موفر خدمة لغة التوصيف الموسعة والذي يمكن تنزيله واستخدامه" is a long and complex phrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Reorganize the sentence to improve flow. For example: "عنوان URL الخاص بموفر الخدمة والذي يمكن تنزيله واستخدامه بواسطة موفر الهوية لتعريف مقدم الخدمة بشكل لا لبس فيه" (Service provider URL which can be downloaded and used by the Identity provider to unequivocally identify the SP).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'بشكل لا لبس فيه' (in an unequivocal way) is a valid translation of 'unequivocally', it's quite formal and might be overly complex for the target audience. It could be simplified without losing meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a simpler alternative like: "بشكل واضح" (clearly) or "بدقة" (accurately).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "SP-ni aydın şəkildə müəyyən etmək üçün" is a bit clunky and doesn't directly convey the meaning of 'to unequivocally identify'. A more accurate and natural phrasing is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP-ni unikal şəkildə müəyyən etmək üçün

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'şəxsiyyət provayderi' is a direct translation of 'Identity provider'. While technically correct, it might be more understandable to use a more common, although slightly less literal, term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: identifikasiya provayderi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, consider adding a comma after 'XML URL ünvanı' to improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xidmət təminatçısı XML URL ünvanı, SP-ni unikal şəkildə müəyyən etmək üçün identifikasiya provayderi tərəfindən endirilə və istifadə edilə bilər

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'доставчика' is repeated unnecessarily. While grammatically correct, it is stylistically awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL адресът на XML-а на доставчика на услуги, който може да бъде изтеглен и използван от доставчика на идентичност за недвусмислено идентифициране на СП.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The abbreviation 'СП' (SP) is not consistently applied. The original text uses 'SP'. It should be consistently used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL адресът на XML-а на доставчика на услуги, който може да бъде изтеглен и използван от доставчика на идентичност за недвусмислено идентифициране на SP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Adresa URL poskytovatele služeb XML, kterou může poskytovatel identit stáhnout a použít k jednoznačné identifikaci SP' is a literal translation and loses some of the nuance of the original. 'Service provider XML URL address' could be more naturally expressed. The overall tone is slightly formal and could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adresa XML URL poskytovatele služeb, kterou může poskytovatel identit stáhnout a použít k jednoznačné identifikaci SP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence is long and could benefit from a slight rephrasing for better readability in Czech.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adresa XML URL, kterou poskytovatel služeb zpřístupňuje a kterou může poskytovatel identit stáhnout pro jednoznačnou identifikaci SP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a long sentence structure, which can be difficult to read. Consider breaking it into smaller, more digestible sentences.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing into two sentences: 'Η διεύθυνση URL XML του παρόχου υπηρεσιών μπορεί να ληφθεί και να χρησιμοποιηθεί από τον πάροχο ταυτότητας. Χρησιμοποιείται για την αδιαμφισβήτητη ταυτοποίηση του παρόχου υπηρεσιών.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'αδιαμφισβήτητη ταυτοποίηση' is a very formal phrasing that might not be the most natural or easily understood in this context. It translates literally to 'undisputable identification'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'ξεκάθαρη ταυτοποίηση' (clear identification) or 'μοναδική ταυτοποίηση' (unique identification) for better clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'proveedor' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'proveedor'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: proveedor

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'identidades' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'identidad'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: identidad

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'inequívocamente' is a very literal and somewhat awkward translation of 'unequivocally'. While technically correct, it's not the most natural-sounding in Spanish. A more suitable alternative might be 'de forma inequívoca' or 'de manera clara'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: de forma inequívoca

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ծառայությունների մատակարարի XML URL հասցեն" is a literal translation and could be improved for clarity in Armenian. "Service provider" can also be rendered as "ծառայություն մատուցող" or a more concise alternative depending on the intended audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like: "Ծառայություն մատուցողի XML URL հասցեն, որը..." or "SP-ի XML URL հասցեն, որը..." (if SP is commonly understood)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation contains Armenian words and abbreviations (SP) mixed with English terminology. While understandable, consistency in terminology could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Evaluate whether using a consistently Armenian or a mixed approach is more appropriate for the target audience. If mixed, ensure SP is explained elsewhere.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Identity provider' is consistently capitalized in English, and should be reflected in the Italian translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Provider di identità

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'identificare in modo univoco' is a bit clunky. A more natural Italian phrasing for 'unequivocally identify' would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: identificare inequivocabilmente

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'unequivocally identify' is not accurately reflected in the Japanese translation. While '明確に識別する' (meikaku ni shibetsu suru) translates to 'clearly identify', it lacks the force of 'unequivocally'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a stronger term for 'unequivocally', such as '紛れもなく' (magire naku) or '疑う余地なく' (utagau yochi naku) to convey the same level of certainty. For example: 'ID プロバイダがダウンロードし、SP を疑う余地なく識別するために使用できるサービスプロバイダ XML の URL アドレス' or 'ID プロバイダがダウンロードし、SP を紛れもなく識別するために使用できるサービスプロバイダ XML の URL アドレス'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a rather long and complex sentence structure which might be difficult to read in Korean. While technically correct, it could be broken down for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP를 명확하게 식별하기 위해 ID 공급자가 다운로드하여 사용할 수 있는 서비스 공급자 XML URL 주소입니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term ' unequivocally' is not directly translated. While '명확하게' (myeonghwakage) conveys clarity, the original intent of 'unequivocally' might be slightly weakened. Consider if a stronger synonym might be appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a word that emphasizes certainty, such as '확실하게' (hwaksilhage) which means 'certainly' or 'definitely' if the context warrants it.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ກໍານົດຢ່າງຈະແຈ້ງ' (gonot yang chaeng) doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'unequivocally identify'. It translates to 'clearly identify' which is less strong. A better translation would be something that conveys absolute certainty or unambiguous identification.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການ Identity ເພື່ອຢັ້ງຢືນ SP ຢ່າງບໍ່ຕ້ອງສົງໃສ້ (phu hai borikan Identity phuea yangyon SP yang bot song sai) - 'Identity provider to verify SP without doubt'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrasing 'ຢ່າງຈະແຈ້ງ' at the end of the sentence feels slightly awkward.  It would read more naturally if incorporated earlier or rephrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການ Identity ເພື່ອຢັ້ງຢືນ SP ຢ່າງບໍ່ຕ້ອງສົງໃສ້ (phu hai borikan Identity phuea yangyon SP yang bot song sai)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'vietrāža' is likely a typo. It should be 'vietrāža'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pakalpojumu sniedzēja vietrāža URL adrese...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ko identitātes nodrošinātājs var lejupielādēt un izmantot' is a bit clunky.  A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ko identitātes nodrošinātājs var lejupielādēt, lai nepārprotami identificētu SP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses a comma (,) where a semicolon (;) might be more appropriate given the technical context. Polish often uses semicolons to separate related clauses, similar to English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adres URL XML usługodawcy; który może być pobrany i wykorzystany przez dostawcę tożsamości do jednoznacznej identyfikacji usługodawcy

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'Service provider' is 'fornecedor de serviços', which is accurate. However, 'SP' is not translated. It should ideally be translated or explained.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider adding a brief explanation or translation for 'SP', such as: 'O endereço URL XML do fornecedor de serviços (SP) que pode ser descarregado...'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Identity provider' is translated as 'fornecedor de Identidade'. While understandable, a more common and accurate translation would be 'provedor de identidade'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'fornecedor de Identidade' with 'provedor de identidade'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Service provider' should be translated as 'Fornecedor de serviços', not just 'provedor de serviços'. While 'provedor' is understandable, 'fornecedor' is more accurate in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O endereço XML do fornecedor de serviços que pode ser baixado e usado pelo provedor de identidade para identificar inequivocamente o SP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "furnizorul de servicii" is repeated several times. While technically correct, it's stylistically repetitive. Consider rephrasing for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adresa URL a fişierului XML al furnizorului de servicii, care poate fi descărcat şi utilizat de către furnizorul de identitate pentru identificarea fără echivoc a acestuia.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "fără echivoc" is accurate, it's quite formal. The context may warrant a less formal equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: fără ambiguitate

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "поставщиком учетных записей" (account provider) is not an accurate translation of "Identity provider." "Identity provider" refers to the entity that manages user identities, not just accounts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-адрес XML-файла поставщика сервиса. Файл можно скачать, и он будет использоваться идентификатором (Identity provider), чтобы однозначно идентифицировать поставщика сервиса.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Identity provider' should ideally be kept in English within the Russian translation, especially in a technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-адрес XML-файла поставщика сервиса. Файл можно скачать, и он будет использоваться Identity provider, чтобы однозначно идентифицировать поставщика сервиса.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'නිශ්චිතව' is spelled incorrectly. The correct spelling is 'නිශ්චිත'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නිශ්චිත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow and clarity. 'සේවා ප්‍රතිපාදකයාගේ XML ඒ.ස.නි. ලිපිනය බාගත කර භාවිතා කිරීමට හැකිය' is a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සේවා ප්‍රතිපාදකයාගේ XML ලිපිනය බාගත කර, අනන්‍යතා ප්‍රතිපාදකයාට SP හඳුනා ගැනීමට භාවිතා කළ හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The abbreviation 'ඒ.ස.නි.' (A.S.N.) is not commonly used in Sinhala in this context. It's better to avoid technical abbreviations or explain them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove or explain 'ඒ.ස.නි.' and use 'XML ලිපිනය' or 'XML වෙබ් ලිපිනය' instead.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation conveys the general meaning, 'unequivocally identify' is a strong term. A more natural phrasing in Sinhala might be 'හැඳින්නේ' or 'గుర్తించే' which implies recognition rather than definitive identification.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Instead of 'නිශ්චිතව හඳුනා ගැනීමට' consider using 'හැඳින්නේ' or 'గుర్తించే'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation lacks a period at the end of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a period at the end of the sentence: 'Adresa URL poskytovateľa služby vo formáte XML, ktorú môže poskytovateľ identity načítať a použiť na jednoznačnú identifikáciu SP.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Service provider' is not accurately translated. 'Service provider' should be translated as 'Ponudnik storitev', which is already used, but the overall phrasing is a bit clunky.  A more natural Slovenian phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL naslova XML ponudnika storitev, ki ga ponudnik identitete prenese in uporabi za nedvoumno identifikacijo SP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The structure is a bit long and can be improved for readability in tooltip format.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL naslova XML, ki ga ponudnik identitete uporabi za nedvoumno identifikacijo SP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'пружаоца' (pružaoca) should be 'провајдера' (provajdera) to more accurately reflect 'provider' in this context. While 'пружаоца' is technically correct, 'провајдера' is the more common and natural term for 'provider' in IT contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Адреса URL XML-а пружаоца услуга која може бити преузета и коришћена од стране идентитетског провајдера како би недвосмислено идентификовао SP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Consistency of terminology. While 'SP' is an acronym, its first use should be clarified or explained.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Адреса URL XML-а пружаоца услуга која може бити преузета и коришћена од стране идентитетског провајдера како би недвосмислено идентификовао SP (Service Provider).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Service provider' is not accurately translated. 'Service provider' should ideally be translated to 'Davalac usluga' or something similar to maintain technical accuracy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Davalac usluga (Service provider)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Identity provider' is missing a proper translation, and the wording is slightly awkward. It should ideally be 'Pružalac identiteta'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pružalac identiteta (Identity provider)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'nedvosmisleno' (unequivocally) is technically correct, but 'jasno' or 'precizno' might flow better in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: jasno ili precizno (clearly or precisely)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence is quite long and could be improved for readability. Consider breaking it into two sentences.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adresa URL XML-a davalaca usluga koja može biti preuzeta i korišćena od strane pružaoca identiteta kako bi jasna identifikacija SP-a bila moguća.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kesin bir surette' is overly formal and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'unequivocally'. It sounds stilted in Turkish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP'yi kesin olarak tanımlamak için

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence is a bit long and could be improved for readability. Consider breaking it into two sentences.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kimlik sağlayıcı tarafından SP'yi kesin olarak tanımlamak için indirilebilen ve kullanılabilen Hizmet sağlayıcı XML URL adresi. Bu adres, SP'yi benzersiz bir şekilde tanımlar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "постачальника сервісу" is repeated. It would read better to vary the wording.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-адреса XML-файлу постачальника сервісу, який може бути завантажений та використаний постачальником посвідчень для однозначної ідентифікації цього постачальника.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'постачальника посвідчень' is a bit clunky. A more natural translation of 'Identity provider' might be 'ідентифікатора' or 'провайдера ідентифікації'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-адреса XML-файлу постачальника сервісу, який може бути завантажений та використаний ідентифікатором для однозначної ідентифікації цього постачальника.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'unequivocally identify' is not accurately reflected in the Vietnamese translation. 'Xác định rõ ràng' translates to 'clearly identify', but it lacks the force of 'unequivocally'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a stronger term like 'xác định duy nhất' (uniquely identify) or 'xác định không thể lẫn' (unmistakably identify).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is not entirely accurate. The phrase " unequivocally identify" is not well conveyed by the current wording. '明确识别' feels somewhat literal and doesn't capture the nuance of unequivocal identification.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 服务供应商 XML URL 地址，该地址可供身份供应商下载并用于唯一标识 SP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. The phrase "克由" doesn't flow naturally in Chinese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 服务供应商 XML URL 地址，该地址可供身份供应商下载并用于唯一标识 SP
